name: Maximum Fighterz: Direct Offensive Action
description:
Competitive fighting done different.
FEATURES:
-Balanced: Designed to be both fun and fair for both players.
-Strategic: Use a variety of Strikes, Throws, and Counters to out predict and defeat your opponent.
-Play Together However: Even with only one controller, there are convenient configuration settings for you to play against your friend/rival/random opponent, locally and online, no matter what.
-Relaxing: Play at your own pace with turn-based combat.
-Deep: Take notes and discover the hidden effects of your moves to surprise an unstudied opponent.
-Easy to Learn: Access the fight tips or utilize training mode to read descriptions of each move in the game.
-Awesome: Enjoy the optional quick-time event minigame to unleash the full power of your ultimate move.
-Family Friendly: No explicit nor suggestive content, so you can focus on the action.

Controller Support: Map your buttons from the configuration menu to select techniques during gameplay with a compatible controller.
